blocks.name: spansn0
blocks.content: The span of the singleton of the zero vector is the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: span0
blocks.content: The span of the empty set is the zero subspace. Remark 11.6.e of [Schechter] p. 276. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm span0() {

} = {

  mp2an(wss(cfv(cspn, emptycls), cfv(cspn, c0h)), wss(c0h, chba), wss(emptycls, c0h))
  shssii(c0h)
  0ss(c0h)
  spanss(c0h, emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cspn, c0h), c0h), wcel(c0h, csh))
  h0elsh()
  spanid(c0h)
  ax-mp(wss(c0h, cfv(cspn, emptycls)), wcel(cfv(cspn, emptycls), csh))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cspn, emptycls), csh), wss(emptycls, chba))
  0ss(chba)
  spancl(emptycls)
  sh0le(cfv(cspn, emptycls))
}

blocks.name: elspani
blocks.content: Membership in the span of a subset of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: spanuni
blocks.content: The span of a union is the subspace sum of spans. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: spansncol
blocks.content: The singletons of collinear vectors have the same span. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm spansneleq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(span ` { c0 })‚Üí(span ` { c1 })=(span ` { c0 })))
} = {
  sylbid((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h), c1 ‚àà(span ` { c0 }), (span ` { c1 })=(span ` { c0 }), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 ‚â† 0h, (c1 ‚àà(span ` { c0 })‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0))))
  elspansn(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, cc, (c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h), c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (span ` { c1 })=(span ` { c0 }))
  eqtrd((span ` { c1 }), (span ` { c0 }), (span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)}), ((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 =(hs0[.h]c0))))
  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h), hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (span ` { c1 })=(span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)}))
  fveq2d(cspn, { c1 }, {(hs0[.h]c0)}, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0))
  sneq(c1, (hs0[.h]c0))
  imp43(c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 ‚â† 0h, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)})=(span ` { c0 }))
  com23(c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 ‚â† 0h, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c1 =(hs0[.h]c0)‚Üí(span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)})=(span ` { c0 })))
  exp4b(c0 ‚àà ~H, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚â† 0h, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)})=(span ` { c0 }))
  syld((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), (c1 ‚â† 0h ‚àß c1 =(hs0[.h]c0)), (span ` {(hs0[.h]c0)})=(span ` { c0 }), hs0 ‚â† 0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ~H, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((c1 ‚â† 0h ‚àß c1 =(hs0[.h]c0))‚Üí hs0 ‚â† 0))

  ex(c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (c1 ‚â† 0h ‚Üí hs0 ‚â† 0))
  necon3d(c1, c0v, hs0, nat0, (c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 =(hs0[.h]c0)))
  sylan9(c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), hs0 = 0, c1 = 0h, (hs0[.h]c0)= 0h)
  ex(c0 ‚àà ~H, hs0 = 0, (hs0[.h]c0)= 0h)

  oveq1(hs0, nat0, csm, c0)
  ax-hvmul0(c0)
  biimprd(c1 =(hs0[.h]c0), (hs0[.h]c0)= 0h, c1 = 0h)

thm spansnss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0)), wss(cfv(cspn, csn(c1)), c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cspn, csn(c1)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0)))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wrex(hs1, cc, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)))), wcel(c1, chba))
  shel(c0, c1)
  elspansn(hs1, c1, cv(hs0))
  rexlimdv(hs1, cc, wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  imp(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  com23(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  3exp(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(c1, c0), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), csm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), csm, c1), c0))
  shmulcl(c0, cv(hs1), c1)

}

thm elspansn4(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  impbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, chba)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wne(c2, c0v))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wne(c2, c0v), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  com23(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  3exp(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wcel(c2, c0))
  elspansn3(c0, c1, c2)
  imp43(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wne(c2, c0v), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, c0)))
  com23(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wi(wne(c2, c0v), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, c0))))
  exp4a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, c0)))
  com24(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  exp4b(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v)), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, c0))
  syl5(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v)), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(c2))))
  eleqtrrd(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(c2)), cfv(cspn, csn(c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v)), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1)))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))))
  spansnid(c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c1, chba), wne(c2, c0v)), wcel(c2, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(cspn, csn(c2)), cfv(cspn, csn(c1))))

  imp43(c0 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), c2 ‚â† 0h, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0))
  com23(c0 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), (c2 ‚â† 0h ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0)))
  exp4a(c0 ‚àà SH, c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), c1 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚â† 0h, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0))
  com24(c0 ‚àà SH, c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), (c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0h), c2 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0)
  exp4b(c0 ‚àà SH, c2 ‚àà c0, (c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0h), c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), c1 ‚àà c0)

  eleqtrrd(c1, (span ` { c2 }), (span ` { c1 }), ((c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0h)‚àß c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 })))

  imp((c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0h), c2 ‚àà(span ` { c1 }), (span ` { c2 })=(span ` { c1 }))

blocks.name: elspansn5
blocks.content: A vector belonging to both a subspace and the span of the singleton of a vector not in it must be zero. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: spansnss2
blocks.content: The span of the singleton of an element of a subspace is included in the subspace. (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: normcan
blocks.content: Cancellation-type law that "extracts" a vector ` A ` from its inner product with a proportional vector ` B ` . (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {
  3impia(c0 ‚àà ~H, c0 ‚â† 0h, c1 ‚àà(span ` { c0 }), (((c1[.ih]c0)[√∑]((normh ` c0)[^]2))[.h]c0)= c1)

  oveq1d(((c1[.ih]c0)[√∑]((normh ` c0)[^]2)), csm, c0, hs0, (((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0h)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚àß c1 =(hs0[.h]c0)))

  oveq1(c1, (hs0[.h]c0), csp, c0)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), ((hs0[.h]c0)[.ih]c0)=(hs0[√ó](c0[.ih]c0)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c0 ‚àà ~H, c0 ‚àà ~H)

  normsq(c0)

blocks.name: spansnpji
blocks.content: A subset of Hilbert space is orthogonal to the span of the singleton of a projection onto its orthocomplement. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  sstri(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cspn, csn(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)))

blocks.name: spanunsni
blocks.content: The span of the union of a closed subspace with a singleton equals the span of its union with an orthogonal singleton. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
